name: Dormantville (W.I.P)
description:
The first of "The Night Files" series, an episodic horror game series.

A "found-footage" Psychological Horror game where you will be playing as a paranormal investigator exploring an "Abandoned Orphanage" only to find out that the place is not really abandoned at all even if it should have been.

  • Retro PSX style dithered graphics, simulating cult-classics Playstation 1 games!
  • VHS/CRT filter creating a "FOUND-FOOTAGE" experience.
  • Nostalgic SFXs
  • Creepy atmosphere
Synopsis: "My name is ____ and welcome back to The Night Files. This tape was recorded during my last investigation of the abandoned orphanage north of Midnight Falls, CO. Some of these paranormal sightings were not witnessed by myself during my time at the orphanage which shocked me while I was reviewing the tapes before releasing this episode. A strong overbearing sense of uneasiness was present the moment I stepped foot inside the thick woods surrounding the house, the feeling of which had soon became dread. This tape has not been tampered with by any means and I remain transparent on the content which was filmed that day, viewer discretion is advised and is preferably NOT for the faint of heart."
